name: linker-cmiserver
description: The CMI server that will provide cluster resource's trend usage
preInstallNotes: We recommend at least 0.5 CPUs and 1024MB of RAM for each linker-cmiserver instance.
postInstallNotes: linker-cmiserver LinkerDC/OS Service has been successfully installed!
postUninstallNotes: linker-cmiserver LinkerDC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
